Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Pillowcase \Pil"low*case`\, n. A removable case or covering for a pillow, usually of white linen or cotton cloth. [1913 Webster]
pillowcase n : bed linen consisting of a cover for a pillow; "the burglar carried his loot in a pillowcase" [syn: {case}, {slip}, {pillow slip}]
